flawed_nl_solution:
Malcolm has 240 followers + 500 followers = <<240+500=760>>760 followers on Instagram and Facebook.
He has 760 followers / 2 = <<760/2=380>>380 followers on Twitter.
He has 380 followers x 3 = <<380*3=1140>>1140 followers on Tiktok.
He has 1140 followers + 510 followers = <<1140+510=1650>>1650 followers on Youtube.
Altogether, Malcolm has 760 followers + 380 followers + 1140 followers + 1650 followers = <<760+380+1140+1650=3930>>3930 followers on social media.
#### 3930

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 740, not 760. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
